lyrics:
16 contributorsall night lyricschorus stephen marley
said she wants my loving all night
when she get it shell be all right
said she wants my loving all night
when she get it shell be all right

verse 1 stephen marley
well now she call me on the phone and said shes home alone
and she want me to come over and make her house a home
well i gave it to her once and i liked how she responds
well now im in trouble

chorus stephen marley
said she wants my loving all night
when she get it shell be all right
said she wants my loving all night
when she get it shell be all right

verse 2 damian marley
it seems she need to oil her spine
tell all a gyal toast bread cant build di putty gold mine
need all di doctor fish with di essential slime
she tell me she want to signal the plane n time mi want slow wine
turn on di hbo she want fi watch showtime
give her di cordless microphone she want di one with line
seem like me and this young gyal ya just cant combine
so its sour like lime
running it down the line mr muffin one time
see damian marley liveget tickets as low as 50you might also likechorus stephen marley
said she wants my loving all night
when she get it shell be all right
said she wants my loving all night
when she get it shell be all right

verse 3 damian marley
she call mi pon di i 95
how mi ah tek so long she ah wonder which car mi drive
tired fi listen album now and she want me live
tell me she want fi come knock her out till she cant revive
soah so my planet and the stars align
she tell me she want me know which part her hills and valley dem join
seh she want me ride her like a ferrari sign put appointment aside
nothing cant compromise fi di vibes i provide

bridge stephen marley
its alright
she wants my loving all night
when she gets it shes all right
she wants my loving all night ay

verse 4 damian marley
i should make no physical contact
tell her fi hold it down and still she just cant quiet
seh mi take her up and tun her maniac tellin me dat i compliment her natural habitat
well   it seem like she deaf or she blind
want come step inna mi life when time she deh far behind
want mi play her rhythm till di tape want rewind
and she nah watch no time
and she just nah resign
till she see the sun shine3embed
